title: Enslaved.Odyssey.to.the.West-R.G.Catalyst
description:
Enslaved.Odyssey.to.the.West-R.G.Catalyst

Year: 2013
Publication Type: RePack 
Tablet: enclosing | FAIRLIGHT
Version: 1.0
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Sound language:  ENG

Description: 

The story of Enslaved is based on the famous Chinese novel "Journey to the West", 
written four centuries ago. Ninja Theory studio suffered a classic story in a post-apocalyptic 
future: after 150 years, the world will be destroyed by war and environmental catastrophes, 
and only a few remain alive. Remain very strong and fast fighter Monkey and a young female 
technician Tripp were captured on one of the ships of the slave-owners, who are looking for 
survivors and transported to where not returned. Couple manages to escape, but Trip quickly 
realizes that she can return home only with the help of Monkey. She manages to trick his 
companion, and put on him a special device that connects them together - if she dies, 
he too will be killed. So begins their journey to the west on the destroyed and dangerous world.

Game Features

Cinematic. As a director of colorful scene clips made popular by Hollywood actor Andy Serkis 
(the films "The Lord of the Rings" and "King Kong"). With him, with the help of technology 
Motion Capture copied movement for the main character Monkey.

The world of the future. Players will explore the beautiful and terrifying at the same time, 
which was destroyed by the war, the world is ruled by the forces of nature, and danger lurks 
at every turn.

Care and caution. In the world of Enslaved have to think about every step. Only a careful 
study of the environment and the well-coordinated joint action of Monkey and Trip will help 
to achieve success.

The old story in a new way. On the storyline worked well-known writer and screenwriter 
Alex Garland (movie "The Beach" and "28 Days Later"). That it is the author of an exciting 
arrangement of the classic novel "Journey to the West" and the history of the relationship 
of the main characters.

Life in motion. The combat system is capable of continuous combination of offensive and 
defensive techniques. Special attacks can knock Monkey weapons from enemies, enemies to 
break apart, or beat them with a super-strong blow.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP  (SP3), Windows Vista  (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1), Windows  8 
Processor: Intel  Core  2 Duo 2.2 GHz or AMD  Athlon  II X2 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce  9600 GT or ATI  Radeon  HD 4850 with 512 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Hard disk space: 13 GB
Starting: Install and play.
